attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence for MPs to mislead the public with statistics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As UK politics has become a stage for PR controlled sound bites and media performances, we, the electorate need protection from ministers deliberately using statistics to mislead us. An independant body, like the FSA should be set up to police the legislation. If we had a properly independant media, this would not be neccessary.  A law outlawing this behaviour would remind public servants who they actually work for. The electorate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
